item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: About
item.description: About I am presently working as a software developer at Intuit, where I am working on one of their products known as QuickBooks Desktop Payroll. It has been a wonderful experience working at Intuit till now. :smile: Other than my day job at Intuit, I am an active contributor in open source. Presently, I am working with an organization called elixir-cloud-aai which comes under the umbrella of organization called GA4GH. I was selected in Google Summer of Code under this organization and have stayed connected with it till date.
